text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Let's B VERY clear. YOU are the one that didn't stop this crisis! YOU were repeatedly warned by U.S. intel about the seriousness of COVID19 as far back as November 2019! YOU DID NOTHING! YOU allowed The People 2 mill around like sitting ducks, spreading & contracting COVID19! https://t.co/xFJ3Popt5Z
